birth_place.zh-cn: 四川省苍溪县龙山镇文柏村
birth_place.en: Wenbai Village, Longshan Town, Cangxi County, Sichuan Province

death_place.zh-cn: 山东省济南市齐鲁医院
death_place.en: Qilu Hospital, Jinan City, Shandong Province

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共山东省委书记、山东省顾问委员会主任，原第十三届中共中央顾问委员会委员。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, he served as Secretary of the CPC Shandong Provincial Committee, Director of the Shandong Provincial Advisory Committee, and was a member of the 13th Central Advisory Commission of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 苏毅然的配偶。
description.en: Spouse of Su Yiran.

description.zh-cn: 苏毅然的配偶。
description.en: Spouse of Su Yiran.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1982年至1992年期间设立的，作为废除干部领导职务终身制的过渡性机构。
description.en: An advisory body of the Communist Party of China established between 1982 and 1992 as a transitional institution for abolishing the lifelong tenure of leading cadres.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央顾问委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the Central Advisory Commission of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党山东省委员会的顾问机构。
description.en: Advisory body of the CPC Shandong Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任山东省顾问委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Shandong Provincial Advisory Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任山东省省长、省委书记、省顾问委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Governor, Provincial Party Secretary, and Director of the Provincial Advisory Committee of Shandong.

nodes.id: 中国共产党山东省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党山东省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山东省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任山东省省长、省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Governor and Provincial Party Secretary of Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 苏毅然的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Su Yiran.

description.zh-cn: 苏毅然的逝世地。
description.en: The place of death of Su Yiran.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的、专门培训中国共产党高级领导干部的学校。
description.en: A school directly under the Central Committee of the CPC, specializing in training senior leaders of the party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在延安时期创办的干部学校。
description.en: A cadre school founded by the Communist Party of China during the Yan'an period.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1927年至1937年期间领导的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the Communist Party of China from 1927 to 1937.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军进行的战略性大转移。
description.en: A major strategic retreat undertaken by the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

en: Fourth Front Army of the Chinese Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 在长征途中救过苏毅然的红军战士。
description.en: A Red Army soldier who saved Su Yiran during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的先进青年的群团组织。
description.en: A youth mass organization led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 河北省张家口市的公安机关。
description.en: The public security bureau of Zhangjiakou City, Hebei Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任张家口市公安局局长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Zhangjiakou Public Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省人民政府下设的公安机关。
description.en: The public security department under the Anhui Provincial People's Government.

zh-cn: 中国共产党安徽省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在安徽省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省人民政府的前身。
description.en: The predecessor of the Anhui Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间山东省的权力机关。
description.en: The organ of power in Shandong Province during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在山东省设立的军事机构。
description.en: A military organization of the People's Liberation Army established in Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 随红四方面军进行长征。
description.en: Participated in the Long March with the Fourth Front Army.

description.zh-cn: 作为红四方面军的一员参与了长征。
description.en: Participated in the Long March as a member of the Fourth Front Army.

description.zh-cn: 在长征途中将险些溺亡的苏毅然救活。
description.en: Saved Su Yiran from drowning during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 在许建国担任张家口市公安局局长期间，苏毅然任副局长。
description.en: Su Yiran served as Deputy Director while Xu Jianguo was the Director of the Zhangjiakou Public Security Bureau.

relationships.target: 中国共产党安徽省委员会
中国共产党山东省委员会
中国共产党山东省委员会
中国共产党中央顾问委员会

description.zh-cn: 苏毅然担任中顾委委员时，陈云为中顾委主任。
description.en: When Su Yiran was a member of the Central Advisory Commission, Chen Yun was its Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 苏毅然接替白如冰担任山东省省长（1979年12月）及中共山东省委书记（1982年12月）。
description.en: Su Yiran succeeded Bai Rubing as Governor of Shandong (December 1979) and Secretary of the CPC Shandong Provincial Committee (December 1982).

description.zh-cn: 梁步庭接替苏毅然担任山东省省长（1982年12月）、中共山东省委书记（1985年6月）及山东省顾问委员会主任（1988年12月）。
description.en: Liang Buting succeeded Su Yiran as Governor of Shandong (December 1982), Secretary of the CPC Shandong Provincial Committee (June 1985), and Director of the Shandong Provincial Advisory Committee (December 1988).

description.zh-cn: 苏毅然接替高克亭担任山东省顾问委员会主任。
description.en: Su Yiran succeeded Gao Keting as Director of the Shandong Provincial Advisory Committee.

description.zh-cn: 刘家义在苏毅然逝世后前往送别或以其他方式表示哀悼。
description.en: Liu Jiayi paid final respects or offered condolences in other ways after Su Yiran's death.

description.zh-cn: 李干杰在苏毅然逝世后前往送别或以其他方式表示哀悼。
